name: AugurkCSharpAnalyzer
description: Performs a static code analysis over your test automation and uploads the results to Augurk allowing you to visualize dependencies between features
author: Augurk

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Solution(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the solution file that should be analyzed

inputs.name: specificationProject
inputs.label: Test project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the project containing the SpecFlow test automation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Augurk Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Augurk instance to which the results should be uploaded.

inputs.name: productName
inputs.label: Product Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the product under which the features have been published to Augurk.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the feature files that have been uploaded to Augurk. Supports variables (in the format $(<variable-name>).

inputs.name: additionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional argument(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional command line arguments you want to pass to Augurk.CSharpAnalyzer
